treatment.description: Rhizomes with 2 scales at each node. Erect stems absent. Leaves apparently attached to rhizome, 5--25 ´ 1--4 mm; blade linear-lanceolate, base cuneate, margins entire, glabrous, apex round to round-acute. Inflorescences: spathe 2-leaved, enclosing pistillate flowers. Flowers unisexual, staminate and pistillate on different plants; staminate flowers unknown; pistillate flowers sessile, ca. 5 mm. Fruits ovoid. Seeds not seen.
